message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
Meet me in the middle, no need to be greedy!
I'll compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm willing to give you more, but not that much more. Let's find a middle ground
You're getting low, I'm getting high!
I'm willing to give you most of it, but not everything. This is my final offer
